00112 #if !defined(CONTENTMODEL_HPP)
00113 #define CONTENTMODEL_HPP
00114 
00115 #include <xercesc/util/XercesDefs.hpp>
00116 #include <xercesc/util/RefVectorOf.hpp>
00117 #include <xercesc/util/QName.hpp>
00118 
00119 class ContentLeafNameTypeVector;
00120 class GrammarResolver;
00121 class XMLStringPool;
00122 class XMLValidator;
00123 class SchemaGrammar;
00124 
00134 class  XMLContentModel
00135 {
00136 public:
00137     // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00138     //  Public static data
00139     //
00140     //  gInvalidTrans
00141     //      This value represents an invalid transition in each line of the
00142     //      transition table.
00143     //
00144     //  gEOCFakeId
00145     //  gEpsilonFakeId
00146     //      We have to put in a couple of special CMLeaf nodes to represent
00147     //      special values, using fake element ids that we know won't conflict
00148     //      with real element ids.
00149     //
00150     //
00151     // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00152     static const unsigned int   gInvalidTrans;
00153     static const unsigned int   gEOCFakeId;
00154     static const unsigned int   gEpsilonFakeId;
00155 
00156     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00157     //  Constructors are hidden, only the virtual Destructor is exposed
00158     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00161     virtual ~XMLContentModel()
00162     {
00163     }
00165 
00166 
00167     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00168     //  The virtual content model interface provided by derived classes
00169     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00170     virtual int validateContent
00171     (
00172         QName** const         children
00173       , const unsigned int    childCount
00174       , const unsigned int    emptyNamespaceId
00175     ) const = 0;
00176 
00177     virtual int validateContentSpecial
00178     (
00179         QName** const           children
00180       , const unsigned int      childCount
00181       , const unsigned int      emptyNamespaceId
00182       , GrammarResolver*  const pGrammarResolver
00183       , XMLStringPool*    const pStringPool
00184     ) const =0;
00185 
00186     virtual void checkUniqueParticleAttribution
00187     (
00188         SchemaGrammar*    const pGrammar
00189       , GrammarResolver*  const pGrammarResolver
00190       , XMLStringPool*    const pStringPool
00191       , XMLValidator*     const pValidator
00192       , unsigned int*     const pContentSpecOrgURI
00193     ) =0;
00194 
00195     virtual ContentLeafNameTypeVector* getContentLeafNameTypeVector()
00196       const = 0;
00197 
00198     virtual unsigned int getNextState(const unsigned int currentState,
00199                                       const unsigned int elementIndex) const = 0;
00200 
00201 protected :
00202     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00203     //  Hidden Constructors
00204     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00205     XMLContentModel()
00206     {
00207     }
00208 
00209 
00210 private :
00211     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00212     //  Unimplemented constructors and operators
00213     // -----------------------------------------------------------------------
00214     XMLContentModel(const XMLContentModel&);
00215     void operator=(const XMLContentModel&);
00216 };
00217 
00218 #endif
